article.title: General Dynamics Awarded $51 Million Contract from Space and Naval Warfare Systems Center
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: General Dynamics Information Technology has been awarded a $51 million contract from the Space and Naval Warfare (SPAWAR) Systems Center (SSC). General Dynamics will support SPAWAR SSC Atlantic through the Command, Control, Communications, Computers and Intelligence Secure Voice and Defense Red Switch Network, Information Assurance and Interoperability program.
